overview:
Steve Shoap has invented several way to fight climate change and its effects.

One invention is a way to make cars lighter and safer at the same time. Lighter cars get more miles per gallon and save fuel and reduce CO2 emissions. www.safersmallcars.com

A second invention is a new way to fight wildfires. It can be used to surround prescribed fires to prevent their escape. It can also be used to move water to neighborhoods that have lost their water supply because an earthquake has broken the water mains. www.electric-fluid-pipeline.com

A third invention is a new topology for two-wire intelligent irrigation system. www.water-wire-irrigation.com
